jana hithakami nayakayaku wu nabi (sal) thuman apawath wima: nabi (sala) thumange birinda aayisha (rali) thumiya ethumange awasan winadi kihipaya pilibanda mese wisthara karayi: allahgen ma lada usas bhagyan nam, nabi (sal) thuman mage niwahane sita, mage niwahane nawathan gathayuthu waraye, mage papuwa ha penahalu pedesa matha hisa thaba sitina wita melowin samugathha, allah mage indul ha ethumange indul ekkalaha, (ema siddhiya aya wisthara karayi): ethuman awasan winadi kihipaya gathakaramin sitina wita mage sahodarayaku wu abdur rahman ibnu abi bakr siwak dahati kurak athathiwa paminuneya, nabi (sal) thuman ohuwa nethyoma bala sitiyeya, ethumanta dath madinnata awashya karana bawa watahagath mama ema dahati kura laba dennadayi wimasuwemi?
